Howard Edmund Dea (April 9, 1891 â€“ February 9, 1966) was a Canadian professional ice hockey player. He played with the Calgary Tigers and Edmonton Eskimos of the Western Canada Hockey League. Billy Dea, uncle of James Wisniewski, is his son.
